name: Ariel Vernaza
summary: I'm Ariel Vernaza, a Senior Full Stack Developer based in Panama City, Panama. My expertise lies in Python, C++, Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Postgres, Kubernetes, and GraphQL. I have a strong background in backend development, AI integration, and optimizing system performance. With a Master's in Game Design and Computer Science specializing in Artificial Intelligence, I bring extensive experience across various programming languages (Python, C++, Ruby, Java, etc.), frameworks (Django, Rails, Next.js, React, etc.), AI tools (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.), and backend technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, etc.). I'm passionate about designing robust software solutions, developing AI systems, and engaging in technical design. In my free time, I enjoy swimming, practicing kendo, and playing action RPG fantasy games.

experience.description: At LazyRacoon, I've been working as a Teach Lead, specializing in Next.js, React, MySQL, and NLP (Natural Language Processing). My role involves building backend and database integrations for marketplace and cart flow systems, as well as designing and implementing NLP solutions integrated with product workflows.

At Transfix, I worked as a Senior Software Engineer Fullstack, utilizing Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Postgres, Kubernetes, and GraphQL. My primary responsibilities included developing the Transfix Mobile App and integrating React Native for cross-platform functionality.

At Adelantos, I served as a Senior Software Engineer, specializing in Python, Django, GraphQL, Postgres, and Kubernetes. My role focused on designing and implementing integrations with payment providers and banking systems across multiple countries, as well as developing data mining solutions to enhance market reach
